properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Twende sote nyumbani
mwake:
Bwana Mungu, (aa ee)
twende sote nyumbani
mwake aliyetuumba

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yeye ndiye kinga yetu;
Bwana Mungu (aa ee)
Twende sote nyumbani
mwake aliyetuumba
Yeye ndiye kinga yetu;…

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yeye Bwana wa majeshi…
Ndiye Mungu wa Yakobo…

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mtawala wa dunia….
Ni Mfalme wa mbinguni..

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ndiye Mungu wa wokovu...
Ni hakimu wa dunia...

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jina lake litukuzwe...
Ndiye Mungu Mtakatifu...

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yeye apendaye haki...
Ndiye Mungu mwema sana...
